summary: Iteration 83: Full Testing of Translation Progress Indicator and Permission-Gated Translation Editing. All 11 backend API tests pass. All frontend UI components work correctly including Coverage Card, Missing Keys Dialog with Quick Edit, TranslationsModule with inline editing, search, and Missing Only filter.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/translations/admin/coverage returns 401 without token
Backend: GET /api/translations/admin/list returns 401 without token
Backend: POST /api/translations/admin/update returns 401/403 without token
Backend: Coverage endpoint returns 200 with valid admin token
Backend: Coverage has all 3 languages (EN 100%, ES 100%, ZH 90.3%)
Backend: List endpoint returns paginated translations with proper structure
Backend: List with search filter works correctly
Backend: List with missing_only=true returns only incomplete translations
Backend: Update translation saves value successfully
Backend: Update rejects invalid language codes with 400
Backend: Sync from files works for admin (translations.manage permission)
Frontend: Translation Coverage Card (data-testid='translation-coverage-card') renders
Frontend: Progress bars for EN/ES/ZH (data-testid='progress-bar-{lang}') show correct %
Frontend: ZH missing badge (data-testid='missing-badge-zh') shows '195 claves faltantes'
Frontend: Clicking missing badge opens Missing Keys Dialog
Frontend: Missing Keys Dialog shows quick edit buttons on hover
Frontend: Category Breakdown toggle expands to show per-category coverage
Frontend: TranslationsModule (data-testid='translations-module') renders
Frontend: TranslationsModule search (data-testid='translations-search') works
Frontend: Missing Only filter (data-testid='missing-only-filter') filters results
Frontend: Sync from files button (data-testid='sync-files-btn') present for admin
Frontend: New Key button (data-testid='add-key-btn') present
Frontend: Translations table (data-testid='translations-table') has correct columns (Clave, EN, ES, ZH, Estado, Acciones)
Frontend: Inline cell editing works - clicking cell opens input, Enter saves, Escape cancels
Frontend: translations.* permission group exists in Roles module
context_for_next_testing_agent: Translation Progress Indicator feature is fully functional. Backend API endpoints work with proper auth (401 without token). TranslationCoverageCard shows EN/ES at 100%, ZH at 90.3% with 195 missing keys. Missing keys dialog has quick-edit capability. TranslationsModule has search, missing-only filter, sync-from-files, new key, and inline cell editing. All data-testid attributes are in place. translations.* permission group exists in roles module. Previous iteration 82 sidebar i18n bug is a separate issue not related to this translations feature.
